TEI.2.document_title: Moses Austin to Joseph Nye and Sons, 03-15-1810

barker_notes.barker_summary: Moses Austin to Joseph Nye & Sons, New York.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 170-171

div1.p: Moses Austin to Joseph Nye & Sons, New York.

For value received of Seth W Nye, I promise to pay Joseph Nye and Son or order Seventeen hundred and Sixty Eight dollars at the City of New York in Ninety days after date with usual grace, for which I have signed Triplicate Notes all of this tenor and date One of which is to remain in full force and virtue the other two to stand void—
Pay Messrs Hicks Jenkins and Co the within note
Rec payment in Henry Austin Dft on E and A Townsend at 30 days—
paid in New York and Charges John Butler
